label: SUMMARY
text: I am a FullStack Developer and looking for an interesting job in a friendly, thriving, and exciting company to develop my skills as well as grove with а team. I am good at HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React, Also, I acted as Team Lead in a Webpack command project. I have experience with code versioning tools (such as Git), in creating а REST API. I am responsible, attentive, fast learner and creative in approach of problem solving.
